title: Anita vs The Mandalorian
description:
Music: www.purple-planet.com
In this video I discuss the latest surrounding the Disney+ original Star Wars series The Mandalorian. I of course go over the Anita Sarkeesian tweets related to it, but rather than harp on her as a critic or a person I move on to the underlying critique which happens to be the Bechdel test & how it's actually based on a comic book that was mocking the lack of female representation in film & why it isn't suited for analyzing the medium at all.
